title: Internet/Latency Disconnections lately?
body:
After the massive heavy rainfall in Melbourne a couple of days back, my game's just looking messed up.
Internet seems to work fine, but whenever in game, I'd literally freeze only myself whilst others freely move and play. Then I'd disconnect for like 20 sec, then reconnect itself soon (Which then repeats). 
I am with Telstra (Which of course is always a good reason for this issue), but when I swapped to Vodafone's 4G (Which never has connection issues for league), it still showed the same symptoms.

Just curious if I'm the only one and should get my refund by Telstra and ditch them?

replies.body: I have the same issue and I am with Vodafone nbn.  No idea how to solve this.

really frustrating, have the same issue with Vodafone NBN in Melbourne, for about a week now.
Every other app/website works fine, just LoL that I constantly get disconnects.
Has Riot said anything about this?
I can't play a game like this, and I've tried everything from reinstall and flush dns/reset router and all to no help.

Two weeks now, still not resolve. 
Tried every day, but ....

I have the exact same issue and I've been trying to fix it all week but not sure how?! I'm with Vodafone nbn. Things already tried;
-DNS related fixes.
-Repairing, hextech tool.
-Firewall Exemptions.
-using a VPN fixed the problem somewhat, However when using a VPN the ping wasn't stable but fixed the DC issue

:(
Same here, been happening for the past 3 days

Same issue here. Vodafone NBN. Created tickets and sent logs. 1st response was to change DNS, disable ip6, hextech tool, re install, etc. just sent it the next set of logs as issue is still not resolved.
